item.description:
The Humanities Center at Harvard and the Graduate School of Design present "Multiculturalism or Cosmopolitanism? Multidiversity in the Social Sciences and in Politics"
Ulrich Beck, Professor of Sociology at Munich's Ludwig-MaximilianUniversity and the London School of Economics, in conversation with Homi Bhabha and Mohsen Mostafavi
Monday, October 5, 6 p.m., Thompson Room, Barker Center 110, 12 Quincy St.
Open to the public. No tickets required. Seating is limited.

Humanities Center at Harvard
12 Quincy Street
Cambridge, MA 02138
617.495.0738
www.fas.harvard.edu/~humcentr

I hope I will not be late from work.
My cell 781-718-6203.
Seating is limited, so find your seat and enjoy the lecture. Perhaps we can have a cup of tea afterwards. Maia

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: "Multiculturalism or Cosmopolitanism? .."
